name: CardSafe-AI
desc: CardSafe-AI detects fraudulent credit card transactions with 99.96% accuracy using a Random Forest model. It handles imbalanced data with advanced preprocessing.

name: Movie Ticket Booking System
desc: A real-time platform built using Python (frontend) and MySQL (backend), with user authentication, payment integration, and optimized performance.

name: TrafficGuard
desc: TrafficGuard enhances network performance with tcpdump, Scapy, and HAProxy. It uses Prometheus and Grafana for visualization and load balancing improvements.

name: Codex
desc: Codex is a full-stack coding platform built with Next.js, Express, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB. It features user authentication and customizable problem sets.

name: Microservices Communication Using RabbitMQ
desc: A scalable microservices architecture with Docker and RabbitMQ for asynchronous communication. Services include health checks, item creation, orders, and stock.

name: Keylogger
desc: An advanced keylogger built in Python, featuring keystroke monitoring, screenshot capture, clipboard tracking, and secure data transmission using Twilio and encryption.
